subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Wide receiver Terrell Owens said yesterday that his nagging hamstring injury would probably keep him out of the Dallas Cowboys’ preseason opener Saturday night in Seattle. Although a magnetic resonance imaging test taken last Saturday showed no damage, Owens, who missed his fifth straight practice yesterday, is having his healing-inducing hyperbaric chamber shipped to his training camp hotel room.
